messages.subject: Re: web page on Japan
messages.msgSnippet: ... This web site was in the Sydney Morning Herald this weekend. It s got some amazing links - the person asking about language classes might find something
messages.messageBody:
>
This web site was in the Sydney Morning Herald this weekend. It's got some amazing links - the person asking about language classes might find something here.


http://www.csse.monash.edu.au/~jwb/japanese.html

And since I'm posting I'll say, Inuyama is my favourite castle too!
